question.title: 136. Single Number
question.description: Given a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one. You must implement a solution with a linear runtime complexity and use only constant extra space.
question.handlerFunction: e=>{try{let t=[[2,2,1],[4,1,2,1,2],[1]],r=[1,4,1];for(let n=0;n<t.length;n++){let i=e(t[n]);a().strictEqual(i,r[n])}return!0}catch(e){throw console.log("singleNumber handler function error"),Error(e)}}
